channel.title: Rate this laptop
channel.description:
Well, I seem to be the one in my family with the most knowledge of computers, because my brother keeps asking me for advice. It's not that I get irritated about that, but I'm not always sure what advice I should give. Here's another laptop my brother saw in an ad:
CPU: C2D T2390 RAM: 2 GB DDRII GPU: GMA X3100 <- onboard crappy shit, shared memory. That kills it in my eyes. HDD: 160 GB Screen: 17.1" Price: €499
IMO, it sucks, but my brother only uses it for browsing/writing documents. The cpu isn't bad, but the GPU sucks. But it's cheap.
I'm going to text him that I wouldn't buy it, but this is like the 20th laptop that didn't pass my judgement.
You agree with me, don't you? :confused:

item.title: Rate this laptop
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:1, topic:241845”]Well, I seem to be the one in my family with the most knowledge of computers, because my brother keeps asking me for advice. It’s not that I get irritated about that, but I’m not always sure what advice I should give. Here’s another laptop my brother saw in an ad:

CPU: C2D T2390
RAM: 2 GB DDRII
GPU: GMA X3100 <- onboard crappy shit, shared memory. That kills it in my eyes.
HDD: 160 GB
Screen: 17.1"
Price: €499

IMO, it sucks, but my brother only uses it for browsing/writing documents. The cpu isn’t bad, but the GPU sucks. But it’s cheap.

I’m going to text him that I wouldn’t buy it, but this is like the 20th laptop that didn’t pass my judgement.

You agree with me, don’t you? [/quote]

Look around. You should be able to get a much better one for that price.
I was looking at a
4GB ram
512 dedicated graphics
250 GB drive
Optical layer thing
Dual headphone jack, Fingerprint reader, remonte control & other fancy jazz
I think it was 2.3GHZ dual core.

£500(pounds though not euros)…go hp!(not from hp directly though)

Read full topic

item.title: Rate this laptop
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“RXVL, post:3, topic:241845”]It’s actually a little under $650 USD. But it still sucks for that price.[/quote]Actually, that’s right around where it should be.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate this laptop
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

On another topic

You say you’re the one who has most knowledge over computers, yet you think he needs a core 2 duo 1.8ghz processor, 2gb memory and 160gb hd space just for internet and word.

My brother came up with this one, it was in an advertisement. He asked me if it was a good one, and if I’d buy it. I wouldn’t, but I thought that it was possible that the price wasn’t bad. If you want cheaper, you have to go to the shop. Cheaper ones aren’t to be found in advertisements.

[quote=“Frostie21, post:7, topic:241845”][quote author=RXVL link=topic=318216.msg2523980#msg2523980 date=1226093995]

Nope, $637.22

a little under$650 USD

[/quote]

He was likely talking to Cruzer when he posted,look at the post times.[/quote]

Yea, that ‘Nope’ was directed at Cruzer.

Read full topic
